A serious call to obstinate sinners, or A sounding trumpet to the unconverted Laying forth the danger of living in sin, and delay od repentance. Which may be a warning-blow for wicked men to forsake sin, and to turn to God unfeignedly. By William Knowles. Knowles, William.
[24] p.
printed by H.B. for W. Thackeray at the Angel in Duck-Lane, London : 1684.
Signatures: AB⁴. Reproduction of the original at the Magdalene College Library, Cambridge.
=======
